vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (SampleCrowdsale.sol#632-640) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(openingTime >= block.timestamp,TimedCrowdsale: opening time is before current time) (SampleCrowdsale.sol#634)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (SampleCrowdsale.sol#659-662) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (SampleCrowdsale.sol#661)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (SampleCrowdsale.sol#668-671) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (SampleCrowdsale.sol#670)
